item.description:
The First Annual Single De Mayo Fiesta!

-

Join us for a fun night of Mexican food, drinks, trivia & salsa dancing! The DJ will be playing the best salsa tracks and testing your knowledge of Mexican facts. Dress in your best Mexican garb and remember to bring your sombrero, because it's time for the First Annual Single De Mayo Fiesta!This is a joint event with a number of different meet up groups.

The Essential Details

-- Friday, May 3rd, 2013 --
-- 7 PM - 2 AM --
-- Free Admission 21+ --
-- Sexy Ice-Breaker Games -- 
-- One Free Drink 7-8 --
-- Free Mexican Food 7-9 -- 
-- Salsa Dancing Lessons 9-11 --
-- Flirting & Socializing All Night! --


When you arrive, you will see Alex at the door. Tell him which Meetup group you're with sign in with him. Then proceed to the second floor where the party begins!


- Free Drink Details:

If you arrive between 7:00 and 8:00 pm, you will get a free drink ticket good for any beer, any wine, and lots of mixed drinks! (no shots or top-shelf liquor) Tickets will NOT be given out past 8 PM. Get there early! Tickets expire at 8:30, so even if you get there at 7:59, you can still use it. ;)

 

- Free Food:

Buffet is available for everyone from 7 PM until 9 PM, refills when needed.

The buffet includes fresh made tacos, cheese quesadillas, chicken & cheese quesadillas and chips and salsa.
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs on the second floord. First please check in with Alex at the door! Everyone attending is part of a number of different Meet Up groups
item.name: Joint Event: 1st Annual Single De Mayo Fiesta! 700+ RSVP's
